body_html:
Because I want to switch between training and validation set during training without having to build two iterators for both, so I don't have to reuse my model for different inputs.

I found that the queue runner is stopped once the iterator encounters an OutOfRangeError exception.
body_text:
Because I want to switch between training and validation set during training without having to build two iterators for both, so I don't have to reuse my model for different inputs.
I found that the queue runner is stopped once the iterator encounters an OutOfRangeError exception.
body:
Because I want to switch between training and validation set during training without having to build two iterators for both, so I don't have to reuse my model for different inputs.

I found that the queue runner is stopped once the iterator encounters an OutOfRangeError exception.
